code: /** @format */import React from"react";import{Card,Col}from"react-bootstrap";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import fav from"../../images/fav-off.png";import star from"../../images/rate.png";import img1 from"../../images/prod1.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProducteCard=_ref=>{let{pathCard}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{xs:"12",sm:"6",md:"4",lg:"3",className:"d-flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"my-2",style:{width:"100%",borderRadius:"8px",border:"none",backgroundColor:"#FFFFFF",boxShadow:"0 2px 2px 0 rgba(151,151,151,0.5)"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"".concat(pathCard),style:{textDecoration:"none"},children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{style:{height:"228px",width:"100%"},src:img1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-end mx-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:fav,alt:"",className:"text-center",style:{height:"24px",width:"26px"}})})," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-title",children:["\u0633\u0648\u062F \u0643\u0631\u0628\u0648\u0646 \u0633\u0627\u0639\u0629 \u064A\u062F \u0630\u0643\u064A\u0629 \u0628\u064A\u0628 \u0625\u0633 \u0623\u0633\u0648\u062F \u0643\u0631\u0628\u0648\u0646"," "]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between ",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"",src:star,alt:"",height:"16px",width:"16px"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-rate mx-2",children:"4.5"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-price",children:"880"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-currency mx-1",children:"\u0631\u064A\u0627\u0644"})]})]})})]})]})});};export default ProducteCard;
